physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1031 Kay's Jewelers.'' On back of photograph: ''Kay's Jewelers Ben Kortz, #1031.''

mods.abstract: Exterior view of Kay's Jewelers. Signage says, ''Kay's Credit Jewelers,'' ''Eyes examined glasses on credit,'' ''Watch repairing,'' ''Diamonds on credit,'' and ''Silverware.'' Address on the door is 1617. In 1916, Sol and Edmund Kaufmann opened the first Kay Jewelers in the corner of their father's furniture store.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
